title: Pixel 3a xl screen completely black
content: My pixel 3a xl phone screen has gone completely black, but i know the phone is still on as it vibrates when i put my finger on the scanner, i have tried getting someone else to call it, and i am able to answer but the screen still, stays black. I have tried restarting and holding the power for 30 seconds. I have also tried holding the power button and the volume down, and the power with the volume up button, the screen still shows nothing. (Also yes i have tried charging it)
